text:
"Earlier is better" -- true for any antiviral therapy given for Covid, both small molecules and antibodies. 

Suspect logistical & variant hurdles with Ab Rx will remain ongoing challenges, ultimately limiting them mostly to non-urgent prevention role in immunocompromised. https://t.co/RHj5xUNIQN

More exciting results from the TOGETHER trial in high-risk outpts with Covid19. 50%⬇️in ER/hospitalization with one subcutaneous dose of interferon lambda in a mostly vaccinated (!!!) population. Variant "agnostic." https://t.co/nYll7OrmBR h/t @boulware_dr https://t.co/vyh9E6KTy1
